long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collect oodles of Wordle-like games and track your progress!

:::::::: BROWSE ::::::::
Navigate to your favorite game and add the game to your collection via the popup, or use the browser to find and add new and exciting games! For each of the games listed here, there are special powerful features, so read on to see what you can do!

:::::::: VIEW ::::::::
Use the popup to keep track of all your games. The extension will automatically track your progress and tell you when new daily games are available!

:::::::: HINT ::::::::
The extension automatically spots and hints mistakes, before you make a potentially incorrect guess!

:::::::: TRACK ::::::::
The extension knows when a game is finished and saves it for your future reference. It also updates its interface to let you know how many games you've played today and lets you know which games you can still play!

:::::::: GRASP ::::::::
The more games you play, the more results you'll have to view and compare with! View historical games, with game board recreations and detailed statistics for your best times and guess counts!

:::::::: CHANGELOG ::::::::
v1.2.0 - July 9, 2022
51 available games
This version introduces stability/operation fixes.

v1.1.0 - May 16, 2022
50 available games
This version introduces global configuration, data tracking and exports, many more games, theme support, a restructured and improved monitor API, support for subframe monitoring, and multiple stability improvements contributing to a more powerful experience.

v1.0.0 - March 28, 2022
12 available games
This version introduced a metrics pane for tracking game results, a game browser, and added stability fixes.

v0.0.1 - February 25, 2022
9 available games
Initial version.
